H0.text: On which island are the Cuillin Hills. Mull

H1.text: On which island are the Cuillin Hills. Arran

H2.text: On which island are the Cuillin Hills. Jura

H3.text: On which island are the Cuillin Hills. Skye

A4.text: The Cuillin (Scottish Gaelic: An Cuiltheann) is a range of mostly jagged rocky mountains on the Isle of Skye in Scotland.

A5.text: The Isle of Skye... dominated by the Cuillin, the rocky slopes of which provide some of the most dramatic mountain scenery in the country.

A6.text: The Cuillin hills (Gaelic: An Cuiltheann) are a range of mostly jagged rocky mountains on the Isle of Skye in Scotland.
